page.title: 01General view of Aith
page.content: Aith is a small village with a number of houses clustered around the head of a voe (a narrow inlet of the sea) and the others scattered around the surrounding area. There are low hills around the voe. Aith is not on a main road but on a road which connests the main road west with the main road north. There is a second small community in the east of the block called East Burrafirth. East Burrafirth is a small inlet of the sea from Aith Voe and the 9 houses are scattered around this. Aith is the centre for the community in the surrounding area. It has a shop, garage, hall, junior high school, pier, etc.
